data.title: Making Yugoslavs: Identity in King Aleksandar's Yugoslavia 1442627506, 9781442627505
data.meta_description: When Yugoslavia was created in 1918, the new state was a patchwork of Serbs, Croats, Slovenes, and other ethnic groups...
